about.heading: About Me
about.content: I'm a self-taught developer passionate about engineering systems that blend creativity and logic. My work spans backend development, AI integration, and game systems — from building orchestrators for LLM-driven workflows to designing modular Unity architectures. I enjoy pushing technical boundaries, crafting tools that feel alive, and understanding how humans interact with technology.
